title: Account recovery
body:
I can remember the summoner name, a password that was once associated to the account, a friend's summoner name I used to group up with a ton and my more played champs along with the general level range.

I knew it was created in 2013-14, too. But I don't remember the last password it had or the signup email. I don't even know if I can regain access to that email since I wont remember any information associated to it.

Is it even possible to get this account back and would they bother? No RP purchases were ever made and no debit card was attached since I was 14 when I created the account.

replies.body: It's still possible to get that account back, though you might need to try to remember a few more details. Hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking the option "I need help recovering my account". Once they can verify you were the creator of the account, they'll be able to help you get back on the Rift!
